description: Armor decreases the amount of damage received by given percentage

perc.description: Values over 1.0 heal the player on hit, values under 0.0 make him even more vulnerable than when unarmored. The greater the number, the more the damage is reduced.

bulletHitSounds.description: Array of sound ids, one of which is played when hit by bullet.

energyHitSounds.description: Array of sound ids, one of which is played when hit by energy type damage.

baseSoundPitch.description: Multiplier of hit sound pitch. Defaults to 1.
